House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sullivan amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 250 (Roll no. 287).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment allows the National Science Foundation to support the creation of K-12 science curriculum, informal education materials, exhibits, and multi-media relevant to global warming, climate science, and greenhouse reduction strategies.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subsection at the end of section 3 with respect to global warming education.

description: Amendment to the Honda amendment (A001) sought to clarify that materials, exhibits, and multimedia presentations shall reflect the diversity of scientific opinion.
purpose: An amendment to insert a new paragraph after paragraph 1 of the Honda amendment to clarify what such materials, exhibits, and multimedia presentations shall reflect.
